word_mean: 如系指(趾)，则指离开肢体的轴线

derivation.yuyuan_name: early 17th cent.: from Latin abduct- 'led away', from the verb abducere, from ab- 'away, from' + ducere 'to lead'

entry.def: If someone is abducted by another person, he or she is taken away illegally, usually using force.

example.ex: His car was held up and he was abducted by four gunmen...
example.tran: 他的车遭遇拦劫，随后他被4名持枪歹徒劫持。

example.ex: She was charged with abducting a six-month-old child.
example.tran: 她被控诱拐一个6个月大的孩子。

means.word_mean: 1. take away to an undisclosed location against their will and usually in order to extract a ransom;

auth_sentence.content: Even her defenders find it hard to believe she knew nothing of the plan to abduct her.
auth_sentence.res_content: Even her defenders find it hard to believe she knew nothing of the plan to abduct her.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Even her defenders find it hard to believe she knew nothing of the plan to abduct her.

auth_sentence.content: She just had no steady job, no permanent home & had already tried to abduct us twice.
auth_sentence.res_content: She just had no steady job, no permanent home & had already tried to abduct us twice.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: She just had no steady job, no permanent home & had already tried to abduct us twice.

auth_sentence.content: The paper said North Korea will pay the price if it tries to abduct China's North Korea policy.
auth_sentence.res_content: The paper said North Korea will pay the price if it tries to abduct China's North Korea policy.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The paper said North Korea will pay the price if it tries to abduct China's North Korea policy.

stems_affixes.value_cn: 易拉长的,易变形的,可塑的
stems_affixes.word_buile: duct引导,带来+ile能……的→能引导的→可塑的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 生产[性]的,能产的,多产的
stems_affixes.word_buile: product[n.产品,产物;乘积]+ive……的→adj.生产[性]的,能产的,多产的
via路+duct引导,带来→引导路的路
con共同+duct引导,带来→引导大家一起指挥

stems_affixes.value_cn: 管理者;[汽车]售票员;领队,指挥;导体
stems_affixes.word_buile: conduct引导;管理;指挥[乐队];传导+or人或物器→n.管理者;[汽车]售票员;领队,指挥;导体

stems_affixes.value_cn: 引出, 排出, 推断, 引出物
stems_affixes.word_buile: educt=educe[v.引出;演绎]+ion表名词→n.引出, 排出, 推断, 引出物
product[n.产品,产物;乘积]+ivity表名词→n.生产率
seduct=seduce[v.勾引,诱惑]+ion动作或状态→n.诱惑
vent风,通风+i+duct引导,带来→引导通风

stems_affixes.value_cn: 引导;管理;指挥[乐队];传导
stems_affixes.word_buile: con共同+duct引导,带来→引导大家一起指挥
in进入+duct引导,带来→引进→引导

sentences.en: The kid was abducted at the gate of kindergarten.
sentences.cn: 那小孩在幼儿园大门口被绑架走了。

sentences.en: Detectives have not ruled out the possibility that she was abducted.
sentences.cn: 侦探尚未排除她被绑架的可能性。

jushi.english: He was afraid of being abducted by a rival gang.
The company director was abducted from his car by terrorists.
jushi.chinese: 公司董事长被恐怖分子从他的汽车中绑架走了。

jushi.english: They abducted a child from his home yesterday.
jushi.chinese: 昨天他们把一个孩子从其家中劫走。
